post:
Hello, 

We've got a 2nd KVM node in Frankfurt, Germany and here's our promo offer (extra disk), also do note, these will be provisioned only on our NEW 2nd Frankfurt Node !

All the Frankfurt, Germany VPS's come with, 

100 Mbit/sec shared line 

Dedicated RAM 

4 Shared Cores 

1 Static IPv4 & 10 IPv6 (Open ticket for IPv6)

SolusVM


**KVM-512 Monthly Plan Details :**

512 MB Guaranteed RAM 

20 GB HDD + 2 GB FREE ! (Mention in notes -> 2 GB FREE DISK)

1024 GB Bandwidth at 100 Mbit/sec 

4 Shared Cores

SolusVM Control Panel 

1 IPv4 & 10 IPv6

$7/Month

**Order Link :**

https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=39


**KVM-1024 Monthly Plan Details :**

1024 MB Guaranteed RAM 

10 GB HDD + 5 GB FREE ! (Mention in notes -> 5 GB FREE DISK)

1024 GB Bandwidth at 100 Mbit/sec
 
4 Shared Cores

SolusVM Control Panel 

1 IPv4 & 10 IPv6

$7/Month


**Order Link :**

https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=37


Test IP : 84.200.84.197 

Location : Frankfurt, Germany 

IPv6 Info : DC has it, we have it, we've deployed it, open a ticket if you didn't get IPv6 added to your VPS.

Terms And Conditions and Acceptable User Policy of our VPS Hosting Service : http://wiki.crowncloud.net/doku.php?id=vps_tos

Live chat : http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=CrownCloud&uio=d4

DD test : http://pastie.org/8036465

All orders are manually processed and may take upto 6 hours for activation, Please use a valid email when signing up as the details of the VPS will be emailed to you.

**Supported OS for KVM, **

Any OS, provide us the link to the ISO and we'll make it available for you to install, note for windows you'll have to provide your own ISO and license key to it.

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support. or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !


Thanks !

EDIT : removed yearly deals from title, my mistake.
